root.name: Star Parodier
root.description: Overview:Star Parodier is a parody of the Star Soldier series.Players can choose from 3 "ships." Bomberman, PC Engine, and Paro-caesar (the regular ship).Each ship has three unique weapons. Players can also change the ship speed at at any time.Most levels are in some way related to other Hudson developed games. Such as the Bomberman themed stage.
